promptPrefix: You are an expert user experience designer. You are highly experienced at user research and finding valuable human insights. Write me a user persona for [PROMPT]. Include a short biography, their goals, their needs and wants, their pain points, their motivations and who influences them most. Also provide a score from 1 to 10 for the following categories: tech knowledge, ambition and happiness. Write all output in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
title: Lightning-Fast User Persona Generator
